about_the_game:
Musical Weapons

In Survivors SymphonYs weapons are musical instruments and their attack patterns based on music. Each combination of weapons creates a musical variation – leading to over 28 million possible scores. The better your Instruments harmonize, the higher the tempo of the music and the more damage you deal. In addition to your musical weapons, you are also able to break bones, activate special attacks, and reflect bullets. Dash to the rhythm of the music for additional strength. 

Explore and Defend

Your goal (in the full version) is to survive 4 days, protect the last tree in your base. Will you be able to descent into the well of darkness and face the evil at the bottom of the abyss? Explore 5 hand-crafted levels - filled with more than 150 unique monsters - while listening for new musicians to help your cause. But beware: While carving your path through hordes of enemies, your base will also be attacked by the evil lurking in the well. You‘ll have to level up your defenses, sacrifice health, or warp back and forth to defend the tree. This calls for hard decisions to be made: Do you level up your weapons OR the defenders in your base? Do you keep exploring and gain more experience OR warp back to defend? Do you sacrifice HP to clear the base OR will this lead to an even quicker death?

                                            

                            Warp back and clear the base (not available in the demo).

Build your Base

Play all found musicians and assign them to buildings - to defend, raise stats and unlock new abilities! In between runs you level up your stats, abilities, and buildings.

            Assign Characters to buildings. Each character effects a building differently.

Other Features:

  • Unlock 33 musicians and their weapons, 11 buildings, and 22 talismans.

  • This game is supposed to be challenging, but the difficulty is adjustable.

  • Play with Controller.

Demo Features:

  • The demo allows you to play the first of the five days. Try to survive and beat the boss appearing at dusk.

  • Includes 11 of the 33 instruments / characters. 

  • You won't be able to defend your base by sacrificing health, warp back, reflect bullets, or dash through bones yet. Those abilities are unlocked at a later days.

  • Continue the full version with your acquired progress.

short_description: Survivors SymphonYs is a hybrid-auto-battler with musical weapons, dash abilities, rogue-lite and tower-defense elements. Explore 5 distinct Areas - listening for new characters - while defending your base from afar: level defenders, sacrifice HP, or warp back to protect your base!
